text: Syed Imtiaz Ali Taj (; ; 1900â€“1970) was a dramatist who wrote in the Urdu language. He is specially famous for his play Anarkali (1922) about the life and love of the dancing-girl of Mughal times, Anarkali.Pauwells, aa This play was later adapted and made into a number of films about the story of Anarkali. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Indian playwrights Category:Pakistani writers
title: Imtiaz Ali Taj
